resources.string: "There are currently no different rules for this federal state. The federal rules apply."
"Proof of status (3G, 3G+, 2G, 2G+) is not currently relevant and is therefore not displayed in the app."
"You have received all currently recommended vaccinations. Your vaccination protection is complete."

plurals.name: VACCINATION_STATE_COMPLETE_IMMUNIZATION_RC_PENDING_LONG_TEXT
plurals.item: "Based on your vaccination and past infection, you are considered to be fully vaccinated. However, your immune protection will not be effective for another %1$d days. Please consider that you could still be contagious and also find out about the recommended booster vaccinations."

"Based on your vaccination and past infection, you are considered to be fully vaccinated. However, your immune protection will not be effective for another %1$d day. Please consider that you could still be contagious and also find out about the recommended booster vaccinations."

"Based on your vaccination and past infection, you are considered to be fully vaccinated. However, your immune protection will not be effective for another %1$d days. Please consider that you could still be contagious and also find out about the recommended booster vaccinations."

"Based on your vaccination and past infection, you are considered to be fully vaccinated. However, your immune protection will not be effective for another %1$d days. Please consider that you could still be contagious and also find out about the recommended booster vaccinations."

"Based on your vaccination and past infection, you are considered to be fully vaccinated. However, your immune protection will not be effective for another %1$d days. Please consider that you could still be contagious and also find out about the recommended booster vaccinations."

"Based on your vaccination and past infection, you are considered to be fully vaccinated. However, your immune protection will not be effective for another %1$d days. Please consider that you could still be contagious and also find out about the recommended booster vaccinations."

resources.string: "You have received all vaccinations for full vaccination protection. Your vaccination protection is effective. Please also find out about the recommended booster vaccinations."
"Based on your vaccination and past infection, you are considered to be fully vaccinated. However, please also find out about the recommended booster vaccinations."

"You have not received all of the currently recommended vaccinations yet. You do not have full vaccination protection yet.\n\nPlease note that the vaccination status displayed in the app is determined based on German infection protection law. Children under 12 years of age, as well as all other people, are currently not subject to any restrictions resulting from the “Fully vaccinated” status displayed in the app. Please follow the recommendations of the German Standing Committee on Vaccination (STIKO), as well as any possibly different rules in your German state."
"Request reissue directly in the app. You’ll find out how to do this in the next step."

"The EU specifications for certificates involving booster vaccinations have changed. This certificate does not match the current specifications. While the vaccination certificate remains valid, the booster vaccination may not be identified during checks. Therefore, please request the issue of a new vaccination certificate.

Do you have other vaccination certificates or certificates of recovery that are not stored in the app yet? Please scan them now, so they can be considered in the checks.

You can request a new vaccination certificate directly and free of charge in the app. Your consent is required for this."
"Renew a certificate up to 90 days after it has expired directly in the app."

"The technical validity of at least one certificate has expired or will expire soon. You can no longer prove your status with an expired certificate.\n\nYou can request the issue of new certificates free of charge, directly in the app, up to 28 days before a certificate will expire and up to 90 days after a certificate has expired. Your consent is required for this."

"You are not exempt from the mask mandate in this state.

Note:
If the state where you are currently located has imposed a mask mandate, a negative rapid test or PCR test will exempt you from this mask mandate for recreational activities, cultural and sports events, and restaurants and bars for 24 hours. An unsupervised self-test is not sufficient, however. Your state may also implement exemptions from the mask mandate after a vaccination or recovery from infection (within the last three months). Exemptions from the mask mandate do not apply on public transportation, in hospitals and care facilities, or to patients in doctors’ offices.

If the COVID certificates you have saved in the app are sufficient to exempt you from the mask mandate in your state, the certificate appears in green. Your exemption from the mask mandate in your state can be confirmed by scanning your QR code with the CovPassCheck app."

"You are exempt from the mask mandate in this state in certain situations, but wearing a mask is still recommended.

Note:
If the state where you are currently located has imposed a mask mandate, a negative rapid test or PCR test will exempt you from this mask mandate for recreational activities, cultural and sports events, and restaurants and bars for 24 hours. An unsupervised self-test is not sufficient, however. Your state may also implement exemptions from the mask mandate after a vaccination or recovery from infection (within the last three months). Exemptions from the mask mandate do not apply on public transportation, in hospitals and care facilities, or to patients in doctors’ offices.

If the COVID certificates you have saved in the app are sufficient to exempt you from the mask mandate in your state, the certificate appears in green. Your exemption from the mask mandate in your state can be confirmed by scanning your QR code with the CovPassCheck app."

"If you do not select a state, the app cannot indicate whether you are exempt from a state-specific mask mandate.

Note:
If the state where you are currently located has imposed a mask mandate, a negative rapid test or PCR test will exempt you from this mask mandate for recreational activities, cultural and sports events, and restaurants and bars for 24 hours. An unsupervised self-test is not sufficient, however. Your state may also implement exemptions from the mask mandate after a vaccination or recovery from infection (within the last three months). Exemptions from the mask mandate do not apply on public transportation, in hospitals and care facilities, or to patients in doctors’ offices.

If the COVID certificates you have saved in the app are sufficient to exempt you from the mask mandate in your state, the certificate appears in green. Your exemption from the mask mandate in your state can be confirmed by scanning your QR code with the CovPassCheck app."

"No state-specific rules have been defined for this state. Therefore, only the standard nationwide rules regarding the mask mandate apply.

Note:
If the state where you are currently located has imposed a mask mandate, a negative rapid test or PCR test will exempt you from this mask mandate for recreational activities, cultural and sports events, and restaurants and bars for 24 hours. An unsupervised self-test is not sufficient, however. Your state may also implement exemptions from the mask mandate after a vaccination or recovery from infection (within the last three months). Exemptions from the mask mandate do not apply on public transportation, in hospitals and care facilities, or to patients in doctors’ offices.

If the COVID certificates you have saved in the app are sufficient to exempt you from the mask mandate in your state, the certificate appears in green. Your exemption from the mask mandate in your state can be confirmed by scanning your QR code with the CovPassCheck app."
"You will only be able to warn others through the Corona-Warn-App until April 30, 2023."

"As of May 1, 2023, you will no longer be able to warn others of an increased risk of infection, nor will you receive warnings from your own risk exposures. Development of the Corona-Warn-App will be discontinued as of June 1, 2023. You will still be able to access the certificates you have saved in the app, as well as your contact diary, but you will not be able to add new certificates."
